name: ShroomScape
description:
My second attempt at making a game and my first (mostly) completed one. This is a small metroidvania where you play as a little mushroom person who is just trying to find their purpose (and some bread). Collect upgrades along the way to help you reach previously inaccessible places. Bounce your way to ascension!

Use Mouse to click START. Movement controls are explained in game. Press' Enter' to get through any text and 'r' to reset to your last spawn/checkpoint.

Sorry about all the audio issues and if there's any latency. I never managed to figure it out :/

Design/Code/Most of the art - Me

Background Music - HeatleyBros Royalty Free Music

SFX - MotionMonkey Royalty Free Sound Effects

And special thanks to u/Toby56 for permission to use their mushroom art on my title screen.
